overview: German Milfs Lana, Julia and Texas don't just search for sun on their summer holidays. These busty cougars are on the hunt for well hung Spanish stallions. Sex Tourism gets a new name as these experienced babes indulge all that Spain has to offer, poolside anal, DP in the woods and a hardcore beach orgy. After a wild week of holidaying, these gorgeous Milfs are left covered in more than just sun cream.
title: Hausfrau Holidays
